thread.title: What Will Determine Lloyd Blankfein’s Legacy at Goldman Sachs

author: Aaron Back
title: What Will Determine Lloyd Blankfein’s Legacy at Goldman Sachs
text:
It is still too early for a definitive judgment on Lloyd Blankfein’s leadership of Goldman Sachs.
In many ways his tenure has been a resounding success. He led the firm through the financial crisis and its aftermath more ably than many Wall Street peers.

The ultimate measure of this may be the firm’s return on equity, the most closely watched... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
